class BinData

Detailed Description

MemMap provides read only access to a range of bytes from BinData.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

UINT32  len,

Constructs a memory map object with the given data.

len Length of data.

Member Function Documentation

const UINT8 * MemMap::GetHandle (  UINT32  idx = 0  )  const
 

Returns a pointer to the value at the given index idx, or 0 if the index is not valid.

UINT32 MemMap::GetLength (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the number of bytes which are accessable.

UINT32 MemMap::Read (  UINT32  idx,
void *  buf,
UINT32  byte_count
)  const
 

Read byte_count bytes starting from the index idx to the buffer buf. Returns the number of read bytes.

BOOLEAN MemMap::Read (  UINT32  idx,
UINT8 &  val
)  const
 

Returns a single byte in val at the given index idx. val is not changed if idx does not exist.

Returns:
TRUE if a value at the index exists, FALSE otherwise.
